# PsiACE Skills

> A concise, LLM-friendly index of PsiACE's skill library for coding agents.

This file is Markdown-first for clean parsing. For human-friendly reading, use the website at https://skills.psiace.me. Start with each skill's SKILL.md to understand triggers and workflow. References are short, focused guides for deeper topics.

## Core (Markdown)

- [Skills overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/README.md): Site overview, conventions, and index.
- [Friendly Python skill](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/friendly-python/SKILL.md): Entry point for Python guidance.
- [Fast Rust skill](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/fast-rust/SKILL.md): Entry point for Rust guidance.

## Friendly Python references (Markdown)

- [API design](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/friendly-python/references/api-design.md): Guidance for shaping Python APIs.
- [CLI argparse](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/friendly-python/references/cli-argparse.md): Argparse patterns and conventions.
- [Error handling](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/friendly-python/references/error-handling.md): Exceptions, error models, and resilience.
- [Extension architecture](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/friendly-python/references/extension-architecture.md): Plugin systems and extension points.
- [OOP design](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/friendly-python/references/oop-design.md): Practical object modeling.
- [Portability and Pythonic style](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/friendly-python/references/portability-pythonic.md): Cross-platform behavior and idioms.
- [Principles](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/friendly-python/references/principles.md): Core principles and heuristics.
- [Reuse and composition](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/friendly-python/references/reuse-composition.md): Composition-oriented design.
- [Review checklist](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/friendly-python/references/review-checklist.md): Code review focus areas.

## Fast Rust references (Markdown)

- [Compilation optimization](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/fast-rust/references/compilation-optimization.md): Build times and incremental workflow.
- [Error design](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/fast-rust/references/error-design.md): Error types, context, and ergonomics.
- [Type exercise](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/skills/fast-rust/references/type-exercise.md): Type-driven design practice.

## Optional (Markdown)

- [Repository README](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/psiace/skills/main/README.md): Repo setup and development workflow.

## For humans

- https://skills.psiace.me
